fader_left.label: Cut
fader_left.tooltip: Cut the beat, sample or none on the left end of the fader
fader_left.description: set what to cut on fader left side

fader_right.label: Cut
fader_right.tooltip: Cut the beat, sample or none on the right end of the fader
fader_right.description: set what to cut on fader right side

left_cut_value.label: Trigger value
left_cut_value.tooltip: The value at which the fader will cut on the left
left_cut_value.comment: fader cut point value, lower value = sharper cut

right_cut_value.label: Trigger value
right_cut_value.tooltip: The value at which the fader will cut on the right
right_cut_value.comment: fader cut point value, lower value = sharper cut

33rpm_value.label: 33 RPM value
33rpm_value.tooltip: The pitch of the motor at 33 RPM

pitch_range_min.label: Min
pitch_range_min.tooltip: The minimum range of the pitch knob
pitch_range_min.description: set the min. range of pitch knob in %

pitch_range_max.label: Max
pitch_range_max.tooltip: The maximum range of the pitch knob
pitch_range_max.description: set the max. range of pitch knob in %

wheel_response.label: Jog wheel response time
wheel_response.tooltip: The response time of the jog wheel - the higher the value, the faster the response (but the lower the audio quality)
wheel_response.description: set audio quality and response balance of the jog wheel
wheel_response.comment: Jog wheel respond time: '1' to '10', 1 has better audio quality, 10 has faster responds (default = '8')

sample_high_pass_frequency.label: Sample high pass filter
sample_high_pass_frequency.tooltip: The frequency of the high pass filter applied to the scratch samples (to remove low frequency beats)
sample_high_pass_frequency.description: set the high pass filter of the scratch samples
sample_high_pass_frequency.comment: sample high pass filter in Hz: '10' to '20000' (default = '10' = disable)

effect_mode.label: Sample effect
effect_mode.tooltip: Which effect to apply to the scratch samples
effect_mode.description: set what to enable in effect mode
effect_mode.comment: sample effect: 'off' or 'reverb' or 'delay' or 'both' (default = 'both', disable effect = 'off')

delay_length.label: Time
delay_length.tooltip: The time of the delay effect

delay_strength.label: Strength
delay_strength.tooltip: The strength of the delay effect
delay_strength.description: set the strength of delay effect

reverb_roomsize.label: Room Size
reverb_roomsize.tooltip: The size of the reverb effect
reverb_roomsize.description: set the room size of reverb

reverb_strength.label: Strength
reverb_strength.tooltip: The strength of the reverb effect
reverb_strength.description: set the strength of reverb effect

reverb_damping.label: Damping
reverb_damping.tooltip: The damping of the reverb effect
reverb_damping.description: set the high frequency damping of the reverb effect

reverb_tone_low_pass_hz.label: Tone low pass filter
reverb_tone_low_pass_hz.tooltip: The frequency of the low pass filter applied to the reverb effect
reverb_tone_low_pass_hz.comment: reverb tone low pass filter in Hz (default = '400')

fader_calibrate_lag.label: Fader calibrate lag
fader_calibrate_lag.tooltip: The lag of the fader calibration
fader_calibrate_lag.description: set the lag distance of fader calibration
